Header.title: Smart Payroll Portal
Header.paragraph: Automated Payroll, Leave, and Employee Management made simple.

About.heading: About Our Payroll Management System
About.paragraph: Payroll processing is one of the most critical and time-consuming tasks for any organization. Manual calculations often lead to errors, delays, and compliance issues. Our Payroll Management System automates the entire process — from salary calculations to tax deductions — saving time and reducing mistakes.
About.paragraph2: The system also integrates HR features like leave management, overtime, and role-based secure access. With automated salary slips, analytics dashboards, and expense reports, it provides an all-in-one solution for modern organizations and startups.

Features.title: Automated Payroll
Features.text: Easily calculate salaries with allowances, deductions, and tax automation to save HR time and reduce errors.

Features.title: Leave & Attendance
Features.text: Seamlessly track employee leave requests and integrate attendance with payroll calculations.

Features.title: Bonus & Overtime
Features.text: Automatically add overtime pay and performance bonuses directly into salary slips.

Features.title: Salary Slips & Reports
Features.text: Generate downloadable PDF salary slips and get monthly or yearly payroll expense reports.

Features.title: Secure Access
Features.text: Role-based login for Admin, HR, and Employees with JWT authentication for data security.

Features.title: Analytics Dashboard
Features.text: Visualize payroll expenses, tax deductions, and employee statistics using interactive charts.
